entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
